Text:
Thanks for the upload. I remember when SNES games were getting fan subs but this is the first PS2 game I have seen with them. Reads very well and looks like a lot of talent and care have gone into the release.
Thanks again.

Tried on pcsx2 and found that the in-game texts (about 75% at least) were messed up, like this: 

TTrie donpcs x2 a ndfou ntha tt hein -gamet ex ts

Not sure if it's because of the emulator or not. Did anyone has encountered this before?
Oops! I was gonna say: Has any of you encountered this before? That was funny...
Tested it with a different emulator and it worked perfectly! I hope it does the same with my ps2 though.
Muito obrigado por compartilhar. Os brasileiros agradecem irmÈÅîo!!!
